resources.string: The formatting of your geofence data was incorrect. Please try again.

Enter name, latitude, longitude, then radius in meters all separated by spaces. If you would like to list multiple geofences then separate the fences by a comma separated by spaces. Columbus Academy is automatically included as a geofenced area. Example geofence entry â€”> austinhome 41.1231 -13.1241 100 , 41.213 -14 50
